p.k: Noir thriller starring Barbara Stanwyck and Burt Lancaster. A wealthy bedridden woman is trapped alone in her apartment when she overhears a murder
Second World War drama about a warship assigned to mail runs but that ends up engaged in battle anyway, starring Edward G Robinson, Glenn Ford and Marguerite Chapman
Second World War drama. Alec Guinness plays an RAF reconnaissance pilot in this tribute to the people and defenders of the besieged island of Malta
Western starring Audie Murphy. A cavalry captain tries to protect a wagon train and a shipment of rifles from the Apaches. But he faces treachery
Comedy sequel. Alex D Linz stars as a resourceful boy who's stranded at home with chickenpox when a top-secret military microchip comes his way
Al Pacino and Robert De Niro star in Michael Mann's crime thriller. A cop sets out to track down a career criminal and his gang of armed robbers
Brutally violent adult thriller with Olga Kurylenko, Morgan Freeman and James Purefoy. A thief gets caught up in a deadly conspiracy. Very strong
Drama. There are just six hours left until the end of the world and Toronto's citizens must decide how they will spend them. With David Cronenberg and Sandra Oh. Strong Language
